recommendations: Skylar Pham ‚ÄúSuraj is one of the very BEST recruiters I have worked with. He has the ability to attract talent, move the process forward promptly yet thoughtfully, and build good trusted relationships with talent, among many other great skills and qualities. I can also see him as a good advisor and consultant for talent as well as businesses. I really appreciate the opportunity working with Suraj.‚Äù

Clement Tan ‚ÄúSuraj is quite simply one the best recruiters I've had a chance to work with. When the opportunity arose, I was quick to request his guidance as my mentor and am truly fortunate to keep learning from him. As a recruitment consultant, Suraj builds genuine relationships that extend far beyond the requirements of the job. He knows his market intimately and is tireless in ensuring the best interests of his clients. As a mentor, Suraj is enormously patient and readily shares his broad knowledge and expertise to anyone who genuinely wants to learn. In short, he is a role model that I try hard to emulate and would highly recommend him to anyone who requires his expertise!‚Äù
